attributes.review: I downloaded to stay informed with the orange, but every since I’ve done it I’ve had horrible luck. I started getting ads on my phone for the trump campaign and I heard one of my favorite apps might get banned because it’s connected to China but it’s very ironic because the Trump app also has ties with China and has sold my information to other companies. I’ve gotten a zillion of calls from telemarketers saying that they got my phone number from this app. It’s horrendous. I’ve also seen Karen’s everywhere I go now which I think the app attracts close minded people. Do not download it. It will ruin your 2020 and of download it could possibly even ruin the next four years of your life. 🙈🥰🤡✨
attributes.title: the worst app ever

attributes.review:
This is the worst app ever, followed by the worst creators ever. First when you open the app it is literally so glitchy. Then you’ll see a ugly fat book shaped boy (can’t say man, he doesn’t event have enough balls to be a man.) with his fists up. Fists are not meant to be for president photography, it’s meant for justice. This app should be deleted. This app is an abomination. It should be flicked out of the surface and nobody with the human eye should see this. Also my friend said this: He can fall off a bridge backwards, ty. I’m currently enjoying my knock trump out game 
-Oliver the great. Anyway the developers of this app need to fix this, it wouldn’t even let me delete it until a couple minutes later. Bye now 🧚‍♀️💞
attributes.title: Worst app that could ever be created

Thank you for reading this hope I can help.😎😉
attributes.title: So bad just bad if yk yk

attributes.review: DONT GET THIS APP‼️ this awful, horrible, horrendous, dreadful, horrific 🤮 , Disgraceful app took 69 YEARS to download ‼️As soon as I opened up the app I was hit in the FACE with a death threat. attributes.review: I have NEVER felt so much hate toward an app IN MY LIFE. Very laggy, took forever to download and had many difficulties loading. Had many horrible messages on the app that was written by the president that left me IN SHOOK. Overall very disappointing and for sure THE WORST APP you can ever download. ANY WAYS, to all non-trump supporters, I hope y'all have an amazing rest of your day and I am manifesting to whoever left a 1 star rating clear skin and A BIG BOOTY🧚🏽‍♂️✨🤩 and for the rest of you who support this orangutan that you call your president, hope y’all fall in a very deep hole that leads to hell🙈☺️❤️ ALSO let me tell y’all how disgusted I felt even pressing the download button, imagine how I feel about this orange Cheeto puff of a man 😍 ok byeeeeeee
attributes.title: MOST DISAPPOINTING APP EVER

attributes.review: when setting up my my profile i including my phone numbers so they can text and call and tell me up dates so i wasn’t surprised when i got a sent a link that i am now to find i got doxed 🤬🤭😱🤯 the website it brought me to was so weird it said it was sending my location to the number i was just confused but i went on with my day so i went to the mall and when i was leaving to middle age white men walk up to me and pushed me the beat me up and proceeded to pull out a lead pipe and break my knee caps then the stole my wallet and keys so if i did make it to my car i can’t drive so i call my sister and she gad to come get me so now i’m broke have no keys and can’t walk 🤬🤯😤😩😣😱😓😧😶🤒🙃🙃😅
attributes.title: I got my knee caps broken 🤬😤

attributes.review: I was playing with my goldfish 🐟 when I got a text📱 from my friend👯‍♀️ saying, “ check this app out” with a link. So I click on the link and it sends me to the App Store. I download the app and the first thing I see is trump’s face🤢 and then it told me to add my phone number. I refused to do so and I exited out of the app. 😤 No sooner than 15 minutes later, I get an anonymous text saying, “add your phone number to trump’s app or you shall pay!!” 📱I was terrified, but I still didn’t add it. The next day I get the same text from a different number, 📱I ignore it again. On the third day I was so busy making a TikTok💃🏾, I forget to feed my goldfish🐟 and it dies.⚰️And that’s how this app killed my goldfish. R.I.P Bubbles🤍
attributes.title: This App Killed My Goldfish!!😥

attributes.review: I am so disappointed. This app was awful and utterly disgusting. As soon as I downloaded it, I felt uncomfortable with all the private info I had to disclose. I was spammed with messages that made me feel that my freedom was being violated👎The app made my phone overheat so many times that my hand got burnt🤕. This is ridiculous utterly ridiculous. I thought our awf-wonderful president would have more consideration making this app for his people. The point system made me feel like I’m being graded for my support and as an adult, I am traumatized. I feel degraded and unvalued by this campaign. The app uses up so much of my storage I had to delete photos of my children, my cat with diabetes, and other memorable pictures.
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTING😰 🤢

attributes.review: I was forced to subscribe to this app for the past 4 years and I’ve hated every moment of it. It got a virus that impacted the entire world and did literally everything EXCEPT solve the problem (including but not limited to: golfing, attacking women’s rights & LGBTQ+ rights, “building a wall”, keeping immigrant children in cages, fueling white supremacist ideologies, ignoring the country’s issue with systemic racism and police brutality, ranting about ‘voter fraud’ and ‘fake news’, ignoring the recommendations of basically the entire scientific community, filing to withdraw from an organization designed to look out for global public health, and trying to ban an entire app because he got trolled by teenagers). Will not be continuing my subscription in November. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.title: White Supremacist 2020 🥰🧚💖

attributes.review: I wanted to know what my friend orange was up to so I downloaded this app, it took 10 years to download😣 waste of 10 years, I could NOT believe my eyes, my phone started flashing pictures on pictures on pictures of him (ones in which he was tanning DID NOT enjoy it🤏😔) I got off the app really fast before his🍑 was shown too😔 but it didn’t stop I couldn’t use my phone anymore, my phone couldn’t take all the ugliness and disappointment it just EXPLODED right in front of me, anyways I had to use my neighbor’s bird’s phone to write this review until I get my iPhone 3 fixed (which I don’t think it’s going to recover after all the trauma it went too) anyways orange life’s DO NOT😌🍊
attributes.title: Horrible app, destroyed my phone😔🤚
